Keywords: Asgardian , Deity , Martial Artist , Marvel Knights , Mystical
Real Name: Matt Murdock
Special Powers
RADAR SENSE AT A COSMIC SCALE: Adjacent friendly characters can use Super Senses.
OPEN THE BIFROST: Passenger: 2. Phasing/Teleport, Sidestep. // Passenger: 4, but only to carry characters with the Asgardian keyword.
HEIMDALL'S SIGHT: Probability Control, but may target a character within 8 squares regardless of line of fire.

Comments
February 11, 2022
Maxphyte
Used him in sealed. He’s kind of a mixed bag but not in a bad way. You basically have to commit to an all in strategy because despite having sidestep and phasing/teleport, if your opponent can reposition their characters during a fight… Daredevil will most likely have to use an action for phasing/teleport. All of this because the sidestep itself most likely won’t get him to close the distance he needs for an attack if your opponent is not dumb. I had a bit of trouble in sealed with this because I didn’t have much range or move/attack figures with Daredevil. Fun figure to use yet not as point and clicky as the dial would seem on paper.
February 6, 2022

It means I keep forgetting that PC isn't automatically a range of 10 anymore.

Hellboy the Bellboy
@heyodern What do you mean by "shortened" when referring to his PC?
February 3, 2022
heyodern
Weird little power taxi. I love the Phasing and the four passengers. The extended but shortened PC is interesting. Willpower, 19 defense, 11 attack are all nice... But in a set filled with damage reduction, that's a lot of clicks with 2 damage and only the hopeful luck of BCF making up for it. I'd love him at 50 points, I'd hate him with a burning passion if I rolled a couple 1s and 2s on BCF.
